name: Wild Fire Drop
description:
This game allows the player to control a Grumman S2 - Tanker to combat wild fires. This is designed for mobile phones so all input is touch screen based. The player can take off by clicking the propeller button at center of the screen. Pick the airplane mode with the radial select button at the top right. Quit to menu with the button at the top left. do a drag action anywhere on screen to change directions.

Not all features are implemented yet.

01/05/2020

Initial build released.
